name: Time Twins
description:
Competitive 1-on-1 game where you're trying to save historical figures from throughout time by transferring them to your teleporter pads, all the while preventing your alternative version from doing the same. Every few seconds time will freeze and you're able to manipulate a single direction in your opponent's previous timeline. Try going for the objectives while diverting your opponent. Only the true Time Twin will succeed!

Made for TrainJam2017 with the theme "Unexpected Anticipation"!

Credits: Stefan Lopuszanski, Alex Van Halen, Indiana Reed, Hannah Evans, Jon Pulsipher, Rahul Madhyan, Charlie McCarron
